package.description: This package includes a single node that allows, by saving the pose of a robot e.e. (w.r.t. a base frame) and the the position (only x,y,z) of a marker/feature w.r.t. a camera frame (marker fixed on the robot e.e.), to estimate the camera frame (w.r.t. the same base frame). Computation functionalities are available as python stand-alone code.
